ChangeList.Description: Add new method to delete a [Password Single Sign-On credential](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordsinglesignoncredentialset?view=graph-rest-beta) associated to a given [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta)

Add new method to get the list of [Password Single Sign-On credentials](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordsinglesignoncredentialset?view=graph-rest-beta) for given [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added two new methods to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource for managing Password SSO credentials
